content:
<thinking>
To get the current weather in Seattle, I will use the get_weather tool. It requires the following parameters:

location (required): The city and state. In this case, it should be set to "Seattle, WA".

unit (optional): The unit of temperature. The user did not specify a preference, so I can omit this parameter and let the tool use its default unit.

All the required information is available to make the API call.
</thinking>
